name: Cheeseburger Mac & Cheese
preparation: Place frying pan over medium heat and coat with oil. Add onion and beef and sauté for about 5 minutes, until beef is almost cooked through. Add peppers and cook for about 3 minutes, until tender-crisp.
Fold beef mixture into Mac & Cheese and stir until evenly mixed. Sprinkle with cheese, if you wish.
tips: Using lean ground beef is a great way to cut down on artery-clogging saturated fat.

products.name: Mac & Cheese Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: An all-time best-seller, this is the Mac & Cheese you’ve been craving – and that your kids will LOVE to eat! Creamy, cheesy, and super comforting, it’s free of unnecessary additives and packed with flavour thanks to real cheddar cheese. Take it from the stovetop (or microwave) to the table in under 10 minutes and dig in!
